dialog.Name: main
dialog.GlobalSrc:
% % The source code writed here will be executed when % windows load. Work like 'onLoad' event of other languages. %
pkg load image
dialog.uiControl:
% This code will be executed when user click the button control. % As default, all events are deactivated, to activate must set the % propertie 'generateCallback' from the properties editor
waitfor(help_dialog().figure)

% This code will be executed when the control lost focus and text has % been changed or when press the "enter" key. % As default, all events are deactivated, to activate must set the % propertie 'have callback' from the properties editor
